item.title: HUB3: Bao buns med fried chicken i sticky sauce. Vietnamesisk inspireret sour coleslaw på gulerod, spirer og spidskål, spicy chili crème og friske forårsløg | Bao buns med panko panerede linse kugler. Vietnamesisk inspireret sour coleslaw på gulerød, spirer og spidskål, spicy hoisin crème og friske forårsløg | | -WEEK 39- | Monday | Thai Peanut Curry with Chicken | Thai peanut curry with chicken, sweet potatoes, carrots, and pak choy made with coconut milk, seasoned with garlic, kaffir lime leaves, and ginger. | Served with brown rice, salted peanuts, and Thai basil. | Thai peanut curry with edamame beans, sweet potatoes, carrots, and pak choy made with coconut milk, seasoned with garlic, kaffir lime leaves, and ginger. Served with brown rice, salted peanuts, and coriander. | Tuesday | Danish creamy shore crab bisque with pollock, orzo, and cauliflower. | Topped with crispy fennel and chives. | Daal topped with crème fraîche, salted peanuts, and coriander. | Wednesday | Crispy and hearty tart made with mushrooms, spinach, and three kinds of cheese. Served with a fresh and tangy salad of radicchio, romaine lettuce, and flat-leaf parsley. | Cake: Pear and cardamom cake with dark chocolate. | Thursday | Classic pork schnitzel. Served with small potatoes and a light, creamy stew of green peas, carrots, and late summer cabbage. | Friday | Bao buns with fried chicken in sticky sauce. | Vietnamese-inspired sour coleslaw with carrot, sprouts, and pointed cabbage, spicy hoisin crème, and fresh spring onions. | Bao buns with panko-breaded lentil balls. | Vegetar | Vegetarisk grøntsagsbøf. Serveret med små kartofler og en let og cremet stuvning af grønne ærter, gulerødder og sensommer kål | Vegetarian | Vegetarian vegetable patty. Served with small potatoes and a light, creamy stew of green peas, carrots, and late summer cabbage.
